report_prompt:
Focus on OLED technology trends, materials advances, and near-term industry implications.
Prioritize insights from papers, open-access journals, and credible industry sources.
Identify 3-5 key technical inflection points, their evidence, and likely applications.
Compare research vs. commercial adoption (manufacturing, yield, cost, lifetime, efficiency).
Call out contradictions or gaps, and suggest follow-up questions for decision-makers.
